author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Hindu Education Plus Fair, which will give students and parents an opportunity to interact with experts from various disciplines, will be held at the Convention Centre, Chennai Trade Cente, Nandambakkam on April 9 and 10.

Students will not only get an overview of various disciplines, but also get to learn about diverse courses that are designed to open doors to many careers.

Satish Jeyaraman, vice- president-HR, Cognizant will be delivering the keynote address and G. Viswanathan, Founder and Chancellor, VIT University, will deliver the inaugural address.

The two-day fair will take place from 9.30 a.m. to 6 p.m. on both days.

New-age careers

On Day one, there will be talks on architecture, mathematics, humanities, journalism, IT and Cyber security and participants will be introduced to a host of new-age careers. Biotechnology, engineering, banking and finance, fashion and design, medicine and entrepreneurship will be a few of the subjects that experts from those fields will throw light on.

Psychometric tests

Students can also undergo free psychometric tests conducted by Bodhi Organizational and People Development Consultants Private Limited, Chennai, at the fair venue.

VIT University is the presenting sponsor of this year’s event.

Vels University, MARG Institute of Design and Architecture Swarnabhoomi and Bharath University are the associate sponsors.

For more details of The Hindu Education Plus Fair, call 9841076111 or 9841079909.
